column5: Now you know how to get even with someone you don't like and have to work with him - https://www.foxnews.com/world/flatulence-in-the-workplace-is-not-a-form-of-bullying-australian-appeals-court-rules
One two three four I declare a fart war.  Let he who drinks the most beer and eats the most McDonald’s win.

Total Bull on the Judge's part. Sorry, but getting farted on in your FACE and On PURPOSE over and over again is absolutely bullying. Whether or not its worth millions is another story. his boss should have been disciplined for sure.
